name: Run & Gun
description:
Bullseye!

Guns and ammo cost nuyen. Mastering martial arts takes time. And learning how to use explosives without blowing yourself up takes patience and a steady hand. These weapons and more are out there, waiting for you. You have the chance to use them to become deadlier, faster, more dangerous than the next guyâ€”and more dangerous than you were yesterday. You'll have to pay the price to get what you want, but this is the Sixth World. Don't you always?
